page.title: 06PROCTER AND GAMBLE (ONE)
page.content:
Procter and Gamble is a company which produces detergent, soap and personal care products.
There are some Procter and Gamble offices in Gosforth. They are set in 8 acres of land. There are 450 people working in these offices.
The offices opened in 1953. They are used for a number of things. They organise their advertising here. There is also a public relations department. This is where complaints are dealt with.
Procter and Gamble have two royal warrants which means that they can supply their products to the Royal Family.
